effect.shortEffect: Strengthens water moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.
effect.full: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its water-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.

description.ruby-sapphire: Ups WATER moves in a pinch.
description.emerald: Ups WATER moves in a pinch.

description.diamond-pearl: Powers up Water-type moves in a pinch.
